messages.subject: Suenaga Family History
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings, I have a good friend who is a member of the main branch of the Suenaga Clan (Suenaga Shamay)for who I as an ameture historian am doing some
messages.messageBody:
Greetings,
I have a good friend who is a member of the main branch of the
Suenaga Clan (Suenaga Shamay)for who I as an ameture historian am
doing some research.
I am seeking information on Castles held by the Suenaga Clan
ideally including plans and photos. I especially would by interested
in finding a reconstruction of NODA Castle in Osaka which was held by
the Suenaga faily during the first half of the 16th century.
I also am seeking information on the Color and Design of the
Suenaga Mon to paint as a gift for her.
Additionally I would like to find a complete clan history in
english. I am especially interested in the 10th through 17th centuries.

Thank You
